name: Star Trek: Bridge Commander
description:
This installer should create a 32bit prefix and prompt for the install disc.

The game should run without any modification on almost any wine version 1.4 and upwards.

To Do: Add updates and mod installations
content:
files:
- installer: N/A:Select the game's setup file
game:
  arch: win32
  exe: drive_c/Program Files/Activision/Bridge Commander/stbc.exe
  prefix: $GAMEDIR/prefix
  working_dir: $GAMEDIR/prefix
installer:
- insert-disc:
    requires: Setup.exe
- task:
    executable: $DISC/Setup/Setup.exe
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
